IR emit raw codes

dev board Arduino UNO
sensor infrared
features infrared IR emit raw

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • IRLib2 and compatible hardware

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. IR Receiver
  2. IR Raw receive

Buy the components

  1. Arduino UNO R3

Code

Download code ir-raw-emit.ino

Makefile

Prototype

A photo of the actual setup.

Schematic

Wire up the hardware accordingly

Description

This code takes in a raw dump of IR and emits it. This is useful when IR protocols are not defined for example, Mitsubishi Air conditioner model MSY-GE10VA. The file data.h has the list of raw dumps.

References

  1. Use Arduino AVR Board version 1.6.21
  2. IRLib2 for Arduino Infrared
  3. Raw emit code example
